body_html:
@ezyang hey Edward, I have a small script I wrote to test out the different initialization strategies but it doesn't conform to pytorch unit testing. Should I go add some functions to test_nn.py?

If so, should there be a test for each initialization and for each init strategy (string or function)?
body_text:
@ezyang hey Edward, I have a small script I wrote to test out the different initialization strategies but it doesn't conform to pytorch unit testing. Should I go add some functions to test_nn.py?
If so, should there be a test for each initialization and for each init strategy (string or function)?
body:
@ezyang hey Edward, I have a small script I wrote to test out the different initialization strategies but it doesn't conform to pytorch unit testing. Should I go add some functions to `test_nn.py`?

If so, should there be a test for each initialization and for each init strategy (string or function)?
